name: Ferris Wheel: Crazy Jumping
description:
HOW TO PLAY
Click on the screen, control the tile jump, avoid the rotating ferris wheel, you will get one score every time you avoid.
Please be careful not to let the tile be hit by the ferris wheel, otherwise the game will end and you will need to start again.
MODE
Challenge Mode: focus on your every jump, avoid the ferris wheel, get high scores, challenge yourself, and your friends.
Level Mode: we have carefully prepared a number of levels for you, I hope you will go ahead and succeed.
